description:
Please please send I will give you promo code if you post feedback and send me an email.
Please have a try. If you feel it does not worth your payment, write to ceflash@msn.com, I will pay back to you 100%.

If you meet any problem or want to send the feedback, please write to me too.

Features in 1.1.0
1. show local weather and forecast
2. count your steps when you walk

SpeedTracker is now including the current speed, MAX speed, AVG speed, your mileage and time cost. Get your location and show it in Google Map. (network required) 
Running, Biking or Driving, you choose. 

Life version include more features: 
1. show your route in Google Map
2. calculate the calorie for you

Any feature you want to add, write to me. ceflash@msn.com

If you like it, please let me know your idea and improve it. 
If you don't, please write down your complaint. 

Free trial https://developer.palm.com/appredirect/? packageid=com.aowork.gps.speedtracker 

Any feedback or issue, please kindly write to ceflash@gmail.com.

Q & A 
1. Support heading? When the devices have Digital compass, I will add this feature. 

Thank you for all your feedback.
